Account.Note:
🙌 I’m Geoff, I “stole” all of your NFTs via https://thenftbay.org. I live a minimalist lifestyle and work remotely from a van doing #vanlife. The internet is already decentralised (#indieweb)

 p.s Just in case it it isn't clear enough my avatar is dumb. I would change it but it's a long comedic story involving outstanding lawsuits... 👇👇🏿👇 

1. https://concerned.tech  
2. https://www.smh.com.au/business/companies/extortion-why-web3-is-pissing-off-a-lot-of-software-developers-20220t

Content: look, I just care, a lot. I put my own money into a company & to watch it break a social contract with its community is heart breaking. idk how many times I need to scream it but oss community is not a free source of labour & if you don’t see yourself as part of the community then it’s a 🚩as a community does not belong to a company, a company is part of a community & thus should be consulted & not seen as an externality if said company chooses to be opensource. #opensource #community #gitpod

Card.Title: 車がソフト更新中→エンジン切れない→降りて家に帰れない　コネクテッドカーの思わぬ落とし穴が話題
Card.Description:
自動車通信サービスの思わぬ弱点がSNS上で大きな注目を集めている。
「車がソフトウェア更新中でエンジン切れないので、車から降りて家に戻れない。失敗。パソコンかよ。」とTOYOTAが提供するT-connectの更新状況を紹介したのはITコン

Content:
Today in #projects: datasette-secret-santa - a plugin for running a secret santa group

https://simonwillison.net/2022/Dec/11/over-engineering-secret-santa/

Classic problem: I want to assign secret santa pairings to people without anyone, myself including, knowing who got whom

I've always wanted an ultra-low-stakes project to try implementing RSA public/private key crypto for something, and this looked to be the perfect opportunity!

Bonus: it's really easy to deploy your own copy on Glitch, by remixing mine: https://glitch.com/~datasette-secret-santa

MediaAttachments.Description: Animated demo. I add three participants to the secret santa, generate my personal password, then assign the gift pairings and enter my password to find out who I should buy a gift for (I get Cleo, our dog).

Card.Title: Over-engineering Secret Santa with Python cryptography and Datasette
Card.Description: We’re doing a family Secret Santa this year, and we needed a way to randomly assign people to each other without anyone knowing who was assigned to who. I offered …

⭐ It’s decorating time!

#krita #MastoArt #ArtWithOpensource
#peppercarrot #fantasyart

MediaAttachments.Description: A digital painting with a cartoony painterly style but with advanced shading. The scene is at night, in the middle of a forest in winter. Pine trees and snow in background. In the middle of the scene stands a funny very tall dragon. He has horns like a dear. Carrot, the cat, is on one of them and hang a decorative set of colored lanterns like a rainbow. The dragon is not really sure about this decoration. Meanwhile, Pepper, a young witch ,  just found in a box a shiny large yellow star. She share her excitement with a large smile.

Account.Note: Animal lover, owned by 3 cats, vegetarian, gardener, atheist. Just outside London.  Forever European #GTTO #FBPE #BoycottPalmOil #Boycott4Wildlife #Pigoneer #Cats #CatsOfMastodon  Citizen of #Wülferhampton  Was LadyFluffyOrca on Twitter.  I took this user name as Tilikum was the reason I first joined the bird site in 2012. The ennoblement came later! If it’s good enough for Gavin Williamson it’s good enough for me.

Reblog.Content: Photographer Renatas Jakaitis captured this unintended moment when three fallow-deer were walking along a path and the sound of her camera caught their attention. Like an optical illusion, the deer appeared as one body with three almost identical heads.

MediaAttachments.Description: Three fallow deer standing in snow all looking at the camera as per the text

Content:
I really ought to learn more Welsh. I've had sporadic lessons a couple of times but they've never lasted long enough for me to achieve fluidity.

"dw i'n siarad typyn bach o Gymraeg ond dydw i ddim yn rhugl" - I speak a bit of Welsh but I'm not fluent.

The bad part of my brain tells me I'm old and shouldn't try to cram new stuff into an aging brain, but really I ought. 🐂

Account.Note:
I am an ox that makes games and lightsynths. Recreational shepherd. Carmarthenshire.

Content:
I was delighted to learn today that the Welsh word for sleet is "eirlaw". Basically the fusion of the words "eira" (snow) and "glaw" (rain).

The construction of the word directly reflects the thing it is describing. Lovely.
